li.label: Affectionate Strength
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} channels the overwhelming power of love into every strike, inflicting damage not only with force but with the purest of intentions. {PAWN_pronoun}'s attacks resonate with the strength of devotion, breaking through defenses with tenderness and power.

li.label: Heartfelt Leap
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} moves with the speed and grace of a heart filled with passion, leaping across the battlefield to protect those dear. {PAWN_pronoun} strikes with precision, leaving nothing but the warmth of love in {PAWN_possessive} wake.

li.label: Soothing Presence
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} radiates warmth and compassion, calming the spirits of those nearby. {PAWN_pronoun}'s presence brings peace and harmony, fostering love and trust among allies.

li.label: Unwavering Devotion
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} stands resolute in the face of hardship, driven by an unshakable devotion to those {PAWN_pronoun} holds dear. No matter the challenges faced, {PAWN_pronoun}'s resolve remains unbroken, standing firm to protect what {PAWN_pronoun} loves.

li.label: Affection's Aegis
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} creates a protective barrier around {PAWN_pronoun}self and allies, as love acts as an unbreakable shield. Whether under fire or assault, {PAWN_pronoun} remains untouched by harm, offering the warmth of safety and protection.

li.label: Romantic Feast
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} prepares meals infused with love, offering both sustenance and joy to those gathered around. {PAWN_pronoun}'s cooking nourishes the body and soul, ensuring that everyone feels cherished and cared for.

li.label: Irresistible Charm
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} exudes an undeniable aura of affection, captivating everyone in {PAWN_possessive} presence. {PAWN_pronoun}'s charm and warmth draw others close, forging powerful bonds of love and trust.

li.label: Heartfelt Care
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} heals with the compassion of a devoted lover, mending wounds and offering solace to those in need. {PAWN_pronoun}'s care restores both body and spirit, ensuring that no one is left to suffer alone.

li.label: Love's Bloom
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} nurtures the world around {PAWN_pronoun} with a heart full of affection, encouraging the growth of life in all its forms. Wherever {PAWN_pronoun} treads, the land flourishes, and love blooms in the wake of {PAWN_possessive} steps.
